text: Michael Francis A'Hearn (November 17, 1940 â€“ May 29, 2017) was an American astronomer and astronomy professor at the University of Maryland College of Computer, Mathematical, and Natural Sciences. He was also the principal investigator for NASA's EPOXI mission. ==References== ==Other websites== * Michael F.
